import React, {useState} from "react"; function MainCart({title, price, weight, image}) { const [foodCount, setFoodCount] = useState(0); const onClickPlus = () => { setFoodCount(foodCount + 1); } const onClickMinus = () => { setFoodCount(foodCount - 1); } return (

Корзина

{title}

{weight}г

{price}₽

Итого

1279₽

Бесплатная доставка

) } export default MainCart;
